name: Mister Bunny
description:
The objective of Mister Bunny is to eliminate as many zombies without getting hit once in order to accumulate as much Mister Bunny Coin (virtual currency) as possible. The first connection to the game gives the player 3 welcome Mister Bunny Coin (MBC).

Attention, at the start of each game, 1 Mister Bunny Coin is subtracted from the game wallet (1 game = 1 MBC).

Kill as many zombies to earn as many MBCs as possible.

Commandes :

Move : ← ↑ → ↓

Attack : space or left click
